name: PUSD_Polyquity
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: PUSD is a completely decentralized stablecoin minted by staking Matic on Polygon network. PUSD is the USD-pegged stablecoin used to pay out loans on the PolyQuity protocol.
